divs: Sighting Details it was shortly passed noon. i was listening to the radio, when i heard a mocking bird singing. it was the first of the year. i was lying in the seat of a large piece of equipment. i reached up to turn down the radio to listen, and out corner of my eye, i saw an object coming from the sw at a tremendous speed. all of a sudden it stopped and i over run it. i begin to back track. in about 2 seconds i located again. it hovered for a few seconds,and then it slowly drifted north for about 3 seconds ,and then it looked as tho it just closed in on itself and it was gone. it was round and white with brown markings in the shape of flames on the bottom. i was straight north of eldorado,ok. 4 miles on a dirt road. from what i saw i knew it was a UFO. this so un-nerved me, i cranked my machiine quickly and left. no one beleives me.----one eyed okie.
